transArray.content: The hotel service is very good. There is a free parking lot at the door, a self-service free laundry room, and a robot that delivers food, which is very convenient. Recommend everyone to stay

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you very much for your support and recognition of the hotel. Everything we do is to bring a different holiday experience to every guest. We are really touched to see your satisfaction and affirmation. We We will continue to work hard and be ready for you to come back at any time.
